categories: Category:Dark Forces: Soldier for the Empire audio drama voice actors
Category:Star Wars radio drama voice actors

nodes.text: Kale Browne (born June 16, 1949) voiced Biggs Darklighter in the Star Wars radio drama, and Meck Odom in Dark Forces: Soldier for the Empire audio drama.
From 1988 to 1998, he was married to Karen Allen, who played Harrison Ford's love interest in Raiders of the Lost Ark (1981) and Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull (2008).
